item.title: Yo dawg i need some bra bra
item.dc:creator: @killer_numba_1 killer numba 1
item.description:
@killer_numba_1 wrote:

[quote=“pur3 pik3r 9, post:1, topic:73759”]While making a pimptastic command, I get this error

client.java:11472: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

WTF IS A ILLEGAL START OF EXPRESSION?
anyways… this is what it looks like in my client.java

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { if (amount);{ if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){ if (!takeAsNote) { if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) { if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) { if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) { bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount; resetBank(); resetItems(5064); [/quote]

OK BRA BRA I SUGGEST BRA BRA U DELETE ALL THAT BULL SHIT BRA BRA. SAVE COMPILE RUN… CYA… OH YEA BRA BRA!

Read full topic

item.title: Yo dawg i need some bra bra
item.dc:creator: @pur3_pik3r_9 pur3 pik3r 9
item.description:
@pur3_pik3r_9 wrote:

While making a pimptastic command, I get this error

client.java:11472: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

WTF IS A ILLEGAL START OF EXPRESSION?
anyways… this is what it looks like in my client.java

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { if (amount);{ if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){ if (!takeAsNote) { if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) { if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) { if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) { bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount; resetBank(); resetItems(5064);
